title: HW10 Q5: FaceNet
content: Problem Context: In this problem you will read the FaceNet paper that studies the problem of facial recognition. What is novel about their method is a triplet loss on the embedding space of the images of faces. You may see triplet loss show up in various other representation learning methods.
